CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Move camera to explore the fractal
CONTROLS.NAME: navigate

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera will constantly be slowly rotating
CONTROLS.NAME: constant_rotate

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera will automatically jump around on the beat
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_camera_jumps

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Manually do a random camera jump
CONTROLS.NAME: random_camera

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Zoom in or out of the fractal
CONTROLS.NAME: zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Move the media around within the fractal
CONTROLS.NAME: media_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media appears in flat layers or branching curves
CONTROLS.NAME: media_style

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Subtract the grid pattern from the media
CONTROLS.NAME: sub_pattern

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Subtle morphing of the fractal shape for extra action
CONTROLS.NAME: bubbling

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Remove the grid pattern and reflections
CONTROLS.NAME: minimal

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Send a smooth white pulse down
CONTROLS.NAME: pulser

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flasher rising up in sync with the beat
CONTROLS.NAME: flasher_on

DESCRIPTION: Applying a simple pattern and coloring to a standard iterative Mandelbrot transformation.
TITLE: Mandelbrot Decoration_dup
